trans-unit.source: Throws an exception for a Win32 error code.
Win32 error codes are translated from their numeric representations into a system message when they are displayed.
Use <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception.NativeErrorCode%2A> to access the numeric representation of the error code associated with this exception.
For more information about the error codes, see "Win32 Error Codes" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the last Win32 error that occurred.
The detailed description of the error will be determined by the Win32 error message associated with the error.
This constructor uses the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error%2A> method of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal> to get its error code.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the specified error.
The detailed description of the error is determined by the Win32 error message associated with the error.
The Win32 error code associated with this exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the specified detailed description.
A detailed description of the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the specified error and the specified detailed description.
The detailed description of the error is determined by the Win32 error message associated with the error.
The Win32 error code associated with this exception.
A detailed description of the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the specified context and the serialization information.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with this exception.
A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that represents the context of this exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> class with the specified detailed description and the specified exception.
A detailed description of the error.
A reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> occurred.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
info is .
Gets the Win32 error code associated with this exception.
The Win32 error code associated with this exception.
